name: Zombrero
description:
The burning desert sun watches every inch of your last stand in the grinding dust of a daybright bullet hell. 

Defend yourself against an endless zombie horde to preserve ZOMBREROS immortal legacy! 

             

Original Music "Zombrero Meddl" by Azureiu

Installation

Just download the .zip file from itch.io, unpack it and run the .exe!

How to play 

  • LMB: Shoot
  • RMB or R: Reload
  • SPACE: Kick
  • Kicks can't kill big zombies so be sure to get them first!
  • Hold F to slow down time and throw your Sombreriken as far as you can

Post your highscore in the comments! Feedback, bug and problem reports appreciated!

Credits

Made with Godot. Artworks and programming by me; Credits after the endscreen.

Twitter: Gerhard Atze
